title: The best credit card ever!
text: Best card for travelers

title: I wish I’d never heard of this app
text: I cannot get into my account or change my password via the app or website. I’ve sent a photo of myself, my driver’s license and passport as autoprompted and it just goes in circles. I’ve emailed and chatted support with zero response. If you use Revolut there is a serious chance that you will not be able to access your money for a long period of time. Super sketchy.

title: Questa carta e super comodissima
text: Questa e in assoluto la mia carta preferita,ha 36 valute, con il piano metal si possono avere assicurazioni su tante cose, si puo investire in azioni e materie prime, cashback, bonifici internazionali istanti, nulla da dire…

title: Beware of scam
text: They have locked my account and I can not access the money I have in the app.

title: Scammers. This is scam app
text: Guys, be careful. They don’t have credibility and you can get scammed and lose all your money. Stay away

title: Control Freaks
text: Transferred money into my account with Revolut and then they wouldn’t let me access my money. Complete scammers!!!

title: Criminal
text: Stole my friends money by locking up his account and refusing to provide more information, hope these people go to jail

title: SmartDelay - Premium feature was not provided
text:
Our flight was delayed when after boarding turned out the plane is faulty and the flight is postponed by 7 hours.

Turns out the flight had to be registered on SmartDelay 2 hours before departure time to apply for this feature to work. As in our case the flight turned out to be late after departure time they refused to provide the feature promised lounge access.

They recommended to register all the flights upfront to use this feature. ‘After the delay happens they cannot help’.

Earlier Revolut was great but now it turned to find excuses when they have to act…

title: Not trustworthy
text: Converted currencies in my account without my permission. Obviously, you can’t trust them with your money.

title: Worst app ever
text: This app is the worst of the worst when it comes to transfers. I regretted downloading this app. First time doing transfer was a disaster. For those who is  looking forward to downloading this app, be prepared.

title: Referral
text: Only 2 hours to complete said dead line missed would have started today … they were working how you expect the transactions to be made

title: Losing its differentials
text: I was drawn into Revolut bc they used to offer no fees for overseas transactions (up to 1K USD). Now they have started to do it just like the other banks and baking startups. Sad to see a company that was different and used to offer a prime service to slowly become as bad as the bad guys they one day tried to defeat.

title: Would give1 star for great idea.
text:
Execution is awful.Trying to deposit money for 4 hours.Chat people almost like robots.Give general info.
Good idea was exited to download.Let me deposit money on opening 1 now I am trying - declined.Frustrating

title: Revolut has left my family without ANY available funds
text:
Revolut has restricted my account after I tried to pay for my car loan because of the small recent P2P transaction ($900) and asked for supporting documents, now they’re “reviewing” it. Given the fact Revolut is my ONLY account, now I don’t have any access to ALL my money, even can’t buy food or gas, can’t pay my bills. I wish I would never keep any amount over $100 in this sneaky “neobank”.

I have prepared a complaint to FDIC and will submit it on Monday July 10th in case I won’t regain access to my funds before this date.

title: Not working?
text: We are sorry. Something has gone wrong. Please try again. This is the message that I have been seeing. It has not been working

title: No help whatsoever
text:
Suddenly - can’t log in. All help (if any) is in-app, so no chat, no phone number, - nothing. Just shows “we’re sorry, something has gone wrong. Please try later”, and NO HELP!

*upd: created account with my wife’s phone number - ok. Now - the card top up limit is 1000 USD per day - why? The FAQ says that this is for my own safety, - like how exactly do I suffer from being able to top up my account from my own card??

title: Best App
text: The best app I have used in a long time

title: Malfunctioning and bad quality
text: I constantly am not able to add money to the app. There is no issue on my bank side. But the app gives an error message when trying to add funds from my bank and says to contact them. Furthermore more you cannot delete messages in the chat to support, so if you accidentally send sensitive information there is no way to delete it. This app has potential but they just can’t get their act together.

title: Brilliant
text: I have been using this bank app for over a year and I am very satisfied with it. It is easy to use, secure, and has many features that make banking convenient and hassle-free.

title: Scammers!
text: I am Egyptian and lived and studied in The Netherlands. Since I am not a Dutch citizen, and before my residence permit expires on June 30th 2022, I contacted Revolut customer service (have a record of the chat as a pdf) and shared my concerns that they only had me scan my residency permit to sign up for an account not with my passport which is a permanent document and insisted to share my passport and National ID to make sure they don’t steal my money one day. What I thought about is happening. Revolut is keep asking me to update my residency although I explained myself that I am not a Dutch citizen and I have the exact same documentation I shared with them which are my expired residency permit (I can’t renew it as I don’t live in The Netherlands anymore) and the exact same valid Egyptian passport and National ID and they didn’t accept them! They have put restrictions on my account so I can’t deposit money, and can’t receive transfers. I was so happy with my experience with Revolut but they ruined it. Now they are asking me to close my account or transfer my funds although I did purchase crypto and was planning to hold it for a few years and not to sell it now and lose 50% of its value. So disappointed in Revolut and their service. Don’t recommend them, they lied, exploited me and now trying to steal my money!

title: EPIC
text: Super fast & simple to use … plus EPIC support!

title: Low fares quick transfer
text: Easy to use, low cost, and they give the going rate.

title: SCAM. TERRIBLE APP. UNRESPONSIVE. DONT USE!!!
text: This app is a scam and stole funds from me. They position their services as “fraud protection” but once you deposit money they lock you out of your account and customer service stops responding. Don’t use or trust this app.

title: Please check latest update
text: I updated to latest version — but app now says it needs to be updated, with no ability to close out of that screen/access features (and app store only says “open”, since no further update is available). Hence I am locked out of the app, including the service chat. Please help!

title: Good
text: Not super intuitive but worked well for me. Just not a fan on the rainbow every time I open the app-kinda annoying

title: Card compromised
text: As soon as I get the card fraudulent charges started. I didn’t give my card information to anyone so who did?

title: Revolut infuriating
text: It’s impossible to contact anyone by phone and very difficult to quit this app.

title: Adoro
text: Interface lindo e o apoio ao cliente foi super prestável.

title: Do not use or download total waste of time
text: This app is a total scam and waste of time. They will hold your money and delay any transaction for days. Very unprofessional and difficult to deal with. I don’t believe they are trustworthy or honest.  Go ahead and try if you have deep pockets and don’t care about your hard earned $$. Cash app is so much easier

title: Revolut is a TRAP
text: Help! I am unable to send $ at this point AND am unable to close the account because I can’t send/get rid of the $ left in the account—vicious cycle! This app & company are the WORST.

title: Me encantó
text: Me funcionó mucho cuando llegue a un nuevo pais y no tenia cuenta bancaria ni tarjeta de débito. Al enviarme la tarjeta fueron rápidos, confiables y efectivos. Además, su app es maravillosa.

title: Crap
text: They canceled my card due to a fraudulent transaction and now they want money to send out a new one. I've never even used the card so they fraudulent transaction couldn't have come from me. Revolut feels like a scam.

title: Cards being compromised
text: Cards are being compromised. Online identity theft

title: Credit score harm!
text:
US-based customers! My credit score went down by 83points when I opened a Revolut account! Nowhere in the registration process I was informed that it might effect my score!
And the Customer Service is unresponsive for days! This is so unacceptable and no one is even there to tell me how to fix the harm!

title: Okay
text: Love the idea of the app. It’s pretty cool that you can get a medal card for a fee per month. I know it’s not cheap to make so I get it. I can’t use this card with certain things and I don’t like that. The card registers as a prepaid card so it doesn’t work as an option for a lot of payment methods. Wished this wasn’t the case. Such a premium looking card but unfortunately can’t be used as such.

title: Complete disregard for customers, useless support
text: The account was blocked, allegedly for verification. They didn't provide any explanation. 24 days have passed since the blocking, and so far there has been no explanation from the bank. The support service does not comment on anything and does not answer any questions. The terms of the check are increased every time without explaining it. The incoming transfer was canceled, not credited to my account and not returned to the sender. 22 days have passed since the transfer and the sender still has not received it. The bank refuses to provide any documents confirming the return of the transfer and simply ignores any requests and requirements. Bank employees constantly lie in the chat of the bank application (there are all screenshots), do not give any comments about the progress of the check, the reasons for the check and the timing of the check. The worst bank in the world. To date, 24 days have passed, so far all accounts have been blocked and I cannot use my accounts. Support ignores

title: Really bad
text: Whatever you do, do not get a subscription. The premium says customer service is fast, they are just fast to tell you that they are sorry for whatever issue there is without solving anything. Use the free version only…

title: Don’t even bother.
text: Couldn’t even get past the verification process with the correct information because the system is run by a deeply incompetent AI. Worthless app run by a worthless machine.

title: Security
text: Giving one of my exceptionally rare reviews simply to say that Revolut has some feature for flagging when you may be getting scammed, and they saved me from losing €1300 that I don’t have to spare right now. Earned significant customer loyalty from me for that.

title: tricked into fees
text: Somehow I got tricked into signing up for some premium plan that cost me $30 ( $10/month and $20 to cancel!). I never even used the service or got a card!

title: Worst App ever
text: This is the worst app ever. Why not use venmo? I deposited my money through apple pay and they blocked my transaction of wiring money to my lawyer saying i need to verify my account with a card that i paid with. The card they recorded does not exist and is not in my possession so naturally i can't verify this but sent the the transactions with cards i have saying revolt . i tell them i don't have the card and can't verify this and disputing this transaction with my bank as i can't get my money out. they proceeded to ask me for selfie and told them it's last piece of evidence i am providing so then they ask me for selfie again that's not blocking the face with a piece of paper they asked me to put the date in with code. i retook the selfie abs then they said to add the finger selfie like in the photo. This is a joke and  scam this app. Do not use!!!!
